description: A forum admin asks SEOAuditPro to crawl the forum site, detect thin‑content pages (under 300 words), and receive actionable recommendations. The assistant crawls the site, runs on‑page SEO checks to compute word counts, identifies thin pages, and generates a prioritized markdown audit report.

We run a community forum at https://forum.example.com. Could you crawl it and find any thin content pages (less than 300 words) that we might want to consolidate? Please give me recommendations.

Here’s what I found:

- **Thin‑content pages (under 300 words)**:
  1. https://forum.example.com/ (14 words)
  2. https://forum.example.com/about (11 words)
  3. https://forum.example.com/thread/123 (5 words)

- **Healthy page**:
  • https://forum.example.com/thread/124 (≈1000 words)

**Recommendations**
1. **Consolidate the home and about pages** – merge the key information into a single, richer “About” page with at least 300 words.
2. **Expand thread/123** – encourage the original poster or community members to add details, examples, and a clear answer.
3. **Add internal links** from the longer thread to the consolidated pages to pass link equity.
4. **Ensure each page has a unique, descriptive title and meta description** (currently missing on the thin pages).
5. **Consider a “FAQ” or “Knowledge Base” section** where short, repetitive threads can be grouped.

Would you like me to generate a full markdown audit report that includes these findings, priority scores, and step‑by‑step action items?

# SEO Audit Report – https://forum.example.com

---

## Executive Summary
The forum contains three thin‑content pages (Home, About, Thread 123) that are under the recommended 300‑word minimum. These pages dilute SEO value and provide a poor user experience. Consolidating and enriching these pages will improve relevance, crawl efficiency, and rankings.

---

## On‑Page Issues & Priority Scores
| Page URL | Word Count | Issues | Priority |
|----------|------------|--------|----------|
| https://forum.example.com/ | 14 | Thin content (<300 words) | **High** |
| https://forum.example.com/about | 11 | Thin content (<300 words) | **High** |
| https://forum.example.com/thread/123 | 5 | Thin content (<300 words) | **Medium** |
| https://forum.example.com/thread/124 | 1000 | None | Low |

---

## Actionable Recommendations
1. **Merge Home & About** – Create a single comprehensive "About" page with >300 words covering the forum’s purpose, community guidelines, and contact info.
2. **Expand Thread 123** – Prompt the original poster to add details, or rewrite the thread into a Q&A style article.
3. **Internal Linking** – Add links from the long Thread 124 to the new consolidated page and from other high‑traffic threads.
4. **Meta Tags** – Add unique `<title>` and `<meta name="description">` tags to all pages, ensuring they reflect the page content.
5. **Content Strategy** – Develop a “Knowledge Base” section to house short, repetitive questions, reducing the number of low‑value threads.
6. **Monitor** – Re‑run this audit in 30 days to verify word‑count improvements and check for any new thin pages.

---
